price: 210. Bazali kozela, sé Allah akoyela bango okati ya elilingi kowuta na mapata mpe ba anzelu mpona kokata likambo? Mpe epai na Allah, makambo manso makozongisama.
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ظُلَلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡغَمَامِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā an yatiyahumu al-lahu fī ẓulalin mina al-ghamāmi wal-malāikatu waquḍiya al-amru wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
